data.title: USA vs. Australia 2024 Olympics women’s water polo semifinal: FREE live stream, time, channel
data.meta_description: The United States women’s water polo team looks to stay in pursuit of its fourth straight Olympics gold medal with a Thursday semifinal against Australia.
data.text:
The United States women’s water polo team looks to stay in pursuit of its fourth straight Olympics gold medal with a Thursday semifinal against Australia. The game is scheduled to start at 1:30 p.m. ET (7:30 p.m. in Paris) with live TV coverage on USA Network and streaming on demand.

How to watch USA vs. Australia at the 2024 Olympics: Live streams are available with offers from FuboTV (free trial), SlingTV (low intro rate) and DirecTV Stream (free trial).

The game will also stream on Peacock ($7.99+/mo.).

USA vs. Australia

Olympics 2024 Women’s Water Polo

Semifinal matchup at a glance

When: Thursday, Aug. 8 at 1:30 p.m. ET (7:30 p.m. local)

Where: Paris La Defense Arena, Paris, France

TV channel: USA Network

Live streams: FuboTV (free trial) | SlingTV (low intro rate) | DirecTV Stream (free trial) | Peacock ($7.99+ per month)

Boosted by rapper Flavor Flav and Guy Fieri’s “Flavortown,” the United States remains an Olympics juggernaut on track for a spot in the gold medal game for a fifth straight Olympics. The Americans are 5-0 so far in 2024 with their hardest-fought contest of the group coming in the quarterfinals, 5-4 over Hungary. Maggie Steffens scored twice in that matchup.

Australia has played in a medal game in four of six Olympics to this point and could be on track for a fourth, regardless of outcome against the favored Americans. The Australians are also unbeaten so far with their share of tangles in outlasting the Netherlands (15-14) and Hungary (14-12) to close out Group A play. They took down Greece, 9-6, in the quarterfinals.
